title: Annhi Dea Mazaak Ae
sub_title: Click and Watch all Punjabi movies
about: In love, Ammy, after the function, decides to find her. And that's where things turn slightly tragic, as Ammy while in search of Pari on a bike meets with an accident losing his eyesight. Despite getting visually challenged, he has his vision set on Pari. He then goes to England for his treatment, where he makes a new friend Nasir, who is also blind and the start of the friendship brings a twist to the plot.

title: Mitran Da Naa Chalda
sub_title: Click and Watch all Punjabi movies
about: The plot follows four young women who have left their homes to work but face sexual harassment, which has a negative impact on them. Things go wrong when they murder a man on a fateful night and are apprehended. But, they come across Laadi, who despite being embarrassed by his stammering, understands the law and helps the needy four. The plot revolves around whether or not he can discover the truth.

title: Lehmber Ginni
sub_title: Click and Watch all Punjabi movies
about: It's a simple story of a man whose propensity to lie gets him into difficulty, especially with the girl he loves. The film is about whether or not their love will flourish amid this web of deception.
